posts.content:
1965 - 13 window deluxe, extensive full photographic restoration carried out at Rust Republic in 2013. Finished in L31 Dove Blue with Silver White euro spec bumpers and black interior.

Red9 front wishbone suspension and steering rack with discs, rear IRS with 1302s gearbox, recent 1835cc motor with Webber twin choke carb, deep sump, external oil filter, electronic ignition, just run in with around 1000 miles trouble free motoring. Cosmic alloys with good tyres all round, drives very well and rides smoothly even with 4 people and all camping gear it still pulls strong even up hill!

Re trimmed front seats with heater elements, Rusty Lee full width rock n roll trimmed to match fronts, solid oak flooring and wooden headlining with discreet LED lighting. MP3 player with period radio in dash and speakers hidden in kick board.

Full new wiring loom, new brake lines, new brakes etc.



Check out the full build thread here -
viewtopic.php?f=8&t=85453
